title: Jose Barajas
text:
I’m a data scientist working in vaccines manufacturing where I support and manage data driven projects (in a GMP context) through ETL work, ML modling, data visualizations and (now recently) GenAI. In previous rolls I’ve worked as an automation engineer in manufacturing supporting MES systems and process automation.
A Long Island NY native, now living in Durham NC since 2020. In my free time I enjoy board games, playing cello in a community orchestra, and playing video games.



Merck & Co. | Durham, NC  Specialist, Data Engineering | May 2023-Present  Specialist, Manufacturing Automation | May 2020-May 2023  contractor, Data Scientist | Janurary 2020-May 2020  Intern | May 2019-Janurary 2020 
McKesson | Cheektowaga, NY  Central Fill Support Associate | August 2017-November 2018 
University at Buffalo | Buffalo, NY  Research Assistant | May 2013-November 2018 



State University of New York, at Buffalo | Buffalo, NY  MS in Engineering Science (Data Science) | January 2020
State University of New York, at Buffalo | Buffalo, NY  BS in Chemical Engineering cum laude | June 2017
Thanks for checking out my web site!
